Enterprise customers

How to begin

You start with your passion and knowledge. Then choose a promising topic with the help of our Marketplace Insights tool. The way that you teach — what you bring to it — is up to you.

How we help you

We offer plenty of resources on how to create your first course. And, our instructor dashboard and curriculum pages help keep you organized.

Recording your video is the next step. Make sure to have a good setup with proper lighting and sound. Follow our guidelines for best practices.

Recording Tips

We provide detailed instructions on how to record high-quality videos. Our team is here to help you with any technical questions.

Launching your course is the final step. Make sure everything is in place and ready to go. Our platform makes it easy to publish your course.

Launch Tips

We guide you through the process of launching your course, from setting the price to marketing strategies. Get ready to share your knowledge with the world.
